devdoc.details: This contract is a pool that allows users to deposit and withdraw solvBTC and xSolvBTC.The xSolvBTC will be minted, and the solvBTC will be burned when the user withdraws.The SolvBTC will be minted, and the xSolvBTC will be burned when the user deposits.The withdraw fee will be deducted from the solvBTC, and the fee will be sent to the fee recipient.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.solvBtcAmount_: The amount of solvBTC to deposit

returns._0: feeRecipient The address of the fee recipient

params.feeRecipient_: The address of the fee recipient
params.solvBTC_: The address of the solvBTC token
params.xSolvBTC_: The address of the xSolvBTC token

params.feeRecipient_: The address of the fee recipient

params.xSolvBtcAmount_: The amount of xSolvBTC to withdraw

devdoc.title: XSolvBTCPool

userdoc.notice: The pool for xSolvBTC, which is a yield token of solvBTC.
